titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Vassar College Chronological Files, 1860-1998
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Elizabeth Clarke June 2007

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: An artificial collection of materials documenting the history of Vassar College, mostly of a general nature and not related to a particular department, program or event.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: An artificial collection of materials documenting the history of Vassar College, mostly of a general nature and not related to a particular department, program or event. Includes clippings, pamphlets, catalogs, bulletins, press releases, copies or typescripts of letters, programs, articles, newsletters, and other items pertaining to Vassar College.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: An artificial collection, collected by various departments of the Library from multiple sources over several decades.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Vassar College Chronological Files, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

dsc.head: Container List
dsc.p: There is no container list currently available for this collection.
